title: Ube Modern Luxury with Fine-Dining Japanese Restaurant
description: Welcome to ANA Crowne Plaza Ube, an IHG Hotel, a modern escape in Japan's 'City of Flowers' offering everything you need for a peaceful stay. When you're not exploring the city, choose to dine in at the onsite restaurant Aioi. Here, you can feast on Japan's finest cuisine from seasonal produce from Yamaguchi Prefecture: sample seasonal vegetables, fresh seafood from the Sea of Japan, and succulent cuts of Kuroge Wagyu beef cooked right before your eyes.
location_description: ANA Crowne Plaza Ube, an IHG Hotel
